H0.text: Gwyl San Steffan is the name for 26th December (St Stephen's Day or Boxing Day) in which country. Scotland

H1.text: Gwyl San Steffan is the name for 26th December (St Stephen's Day or Boxing Day) in which country. Ireland

H2.text: Gwyl San Steffan is the name for 26th December (St Stephen's Day or Boxing Day) in which country. Isle of Man

H3.text: Gwyl San Steffan is the name for 26th December (St Stephen's Day or Boxing Day) in which country. Cyrmu

A4.text: In the Republic of Ireland, Saint Stephen's Day (Irish: Lá Fhéile Stiofáin) is one of ten official public holidays.

A5.text: In the Isle of Man and in parts of Ireland, it is also known as Wren Day.

A6.text: The day is referred to as Saint Stephen's Day in most of Ireland.

A7.text: In the UK outside Scotland, 26 December (unless it is a Sunday) has been a bank holiday since 1871.
